Peluang Ojol Jadi Transportasi Umum Tak Tertutup, Asalkan...
02 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Kementerian Perhubungan (Kemenhub) menilai usulan ojek online (ojol) bisa terealisasi menjadi transportasi umum tergantung pada Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat (DPR). Wacana tersebut muncul dari para pengemudi alias driver agar ojol dijadikan sebagai transportasi umum atau sama seperti angkutan umum lainnya.Mereka berharap pemerintah merevisi UU 22 tahun 2009 dan memasukkan ojol ke dalam golongan transportasi umum. Direktur Angkutan Multi Moda Ditjen Perhubungan Darat Kemenhub, Ahmad Yani, mengatakan wacana tersebht bisa direalisasikan ketika pihak DPR sebagai perwakilan rakyat memberikan restu."UU itu dibahas di DPR artinya kalau Pemerintah itu sudah disahkan kami tinggal menjalankan," kata Ahmad Yani di komplek GBK, Senayan, Jakarta, Sabtu (3/11/2019).Ahmad Yani mengatakan hingga saat ini belum banyak pembahasan mengenai usulan ojol menjadi transportasi, baik di internal Kemenhub maupun pembicaraan antara Pemerintah dengan DPR.Hanya saja, rencana menjadikan ojol sebagai transportasi umum masih terbuka lebar. Apalagi, jika DPR memberikan persetujuan."Kalau kesepakatan rakyat semua, sebagai wakil rakyat teman-teman di DPR kenapa nggak. Saya tidak menutup kemungkinan," jelas dia.Sebelumnya, para pengemudi alias driver meminta agar ojol dapat masuk klasifikasi transportasi umum. Untuk itu driver ojol meminta pemerintah untuk merevisi UU 22 tahun 2009 dan memasukkan ojol ke dalam golongan transportasi umum.Menanggapi hal tersebut, Menteri Perhubungan Budi Karya Sumadi justru mengatakan ide pengajuan itu bukan dilakukan oleh ojol. Meski begitu Budi Karya mengatakan bisa saja Kemenhub menerima permintaan ojol jadi transportasi umum."Saya pikir yang ajuin ini bukan ojol, tapi pihak lain yang ajukan. Tapi, ya bisa saja kita terima," kata Budi Karya di Kantor BKPM, Senin (7/10/2019). Simak Video "Dear Pengguna Ojol, Ini Tarif Baru yang Berlaku Mulai September"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/hns)

Ojol's Opportunity to Be Public Transportation Unclosed, Provided ...
02 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - The Ministry of Transportation (Kemenhub) considers the proposed online motorcycle taxi (ojol) can be realized into public transportation depending on the House of Representatives (DPR). The discourse arose from the drivers alias drivers to make ojol used as public transportation or the same as other public transportation. They expect the government to revise Law 22 of 2009 and include ojol into the public transportation group. Director of Multi Moda Transportation at the Directorate General of Land Transportation of the Ministry of Transportation, Ahmad Yani, said that the discourse could be realized when the House of Representatives as the people's representatives gave their blessing. Senayan, Jakarta, Saturday (3/11/2019). Ahmad Yani said that until now there has not been much discussion about the proposal for ojol to become transportation, both internally in the Ministry of Transportation and discussions between the Government and the Parliament. Only, the plan to make ojol as public transportation wide. Moreover, if the Parliament gives approval. "If the agreement of all the people, as representatives of the people friends in the Parliament why not. I did not rule out the possibility," he explained. For this reason, the ojol driver asked the government to revise Law 22 of 2009 and include the ojol in the public transportation group. Even so, Budi Karya said that the Ministry of Transportation could accept the request for ojol to become public transportation. "I think the adjuvant is not ojol, but other parties are submitting. But, yes we can accept it," Budi Karya said at the BKPM Office, Monday (7 / 10/2019).
